title: Options.generateNotFoundHtml
content:
#

WARNING

Only effective in development environment

Generate a 404 page. When a user visits a non-existent page, this function will
be called to generate a 404 page.

 * Required: No
 * Type: (rawPages: string) => string


Example:#

title: Configuration Options
content:
#



You can see all configuration option type definitions.

title: `options.pages`
content:
options.pages#

Page configuration, where key is the page name and value is the page
configuration.

 * Required: Yes
 * Type: Record<string, PageInfo>


Type definition#




Example#




page.title#

This title will be displayed in the browser tab.

 * Required: Yes
 * Type: string


page.entry#

Page entry file.

 * Required: Yes
 * Type: string
 * Note:

Use relative paths, for example:




page.template#

Page template file.

 * Required: No
 * Type: string
 * Note:

WARNING

To reuse templates, page.entry will be automatically inserted into the template,
so the template doesn't need to include the entry file and title tag

A minimal example file would be:

title: Quick Start
content:
#


Installation#




Configuration#




Usage#

Start vite serve, visit http://localhost:5173/index.html, and you'll see the
page.

title: Introduction
content:
#

This plugin provides true MPA functionality for Vite, eliminating various
limitations of Vite MP.

No matter where your entry files/template files are located, you can access
pages through the root route, making it perfect for embedded page development.



üôÖüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è: No need to search everywhere for your MPA page addresses.

Try the demo.


Features#

 * True MPA.
 * Load pages on demand - no matter how many pages you have, only the current
   page will be loaded.
 * Support for reusing template files.
 * Support for 404 pages.
 * Support for vue, react...and all frameworks supported by Vite.
